sen.j: 唯一神道名法要集（ゆいいつしんとうみょうほうようしゅう）は、卜部兼延の著作とされるが、祖先に仮託した吉田兼倶の偽作であろうとされる。
sen.e: "Yuiitsu shinto myoho [myobo] yoshu" (Compendium of the Doctrines of the One-and-Only Shinto) was written by Kanenobu URABE, but it is supposedly a fake edition made by Kanetomo YOSHIDA, who made a pretext of an ancestor.

"Yuiitsu shinto myoho [myobo] yoshu" (Compendium of the Doctrines of the One-and-Only Shinto) was written by Kanenobu URABE, but it is supposedly a fake edition made by Kanetomo YOSHIDA, who made a pretext of an ancestor.

"Yuiitsu shinto myoho [myobo] yoshu" (Compendium of the Doctrines of the One-and-Only Shinto) was written by Kanenobu URABE, but it is supposedly a fake edition made by Kanetomo YOSHIDA, who made a pretext of an ancestor.

sen.j: 唯一神道に関する事項を問答形式で記述する。
sen.e: It describes matters of Yuiitsu shinto in the form of questions and answers.
It describes matters of Yuiitsu shinto in the form of questions and answers.
It describes matters of Yuiitsu shinto in the form of questions and answers.

sen.j: 唯一神道の経典の第一とされる。
sen.e: It is said to be the primary scripture of Yuiitsu shinto.
It is said to be the primary scripture of Yuiitsu shinto.
It is said to be the primary scripture of Yuiitsu shinto.
